str2: Already; now at length, now after all this waiting. Apparently from e and de; even now.
Second; with the article: in the second place, for the second time. As the compare of duo; second.
A letter, dispatch, epistle, message. From epistello; a written message.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Feminine Plural

str2: Remembrance, recollection, putting in mind; a reminder. From hupomimnesko; a reminding or recollection.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To wake out of sleep, arouse in general, stir up. From dia and egeiro; to wake fully; i.e. Arouse.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
(originally: unmixed), pure, uncontaminated, sincere. From heile and krino; judged by sunlight, i.e. Tested as genuine.
From dia and nous; deep thought, properly, the faculty, by implication, its exercise.
